annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 3 of the Multiple Dwelling Residence Water Lead Level Test Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-483, July 19, 2004, 51 DCR 7833).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 3 of Multiple Dwelling Residence Water Lead Level Test Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-560, October 26, 2004, 51 DCR 10382).
